markdownRemark.html:
Random Body Part - d4 + appropriate modifier chart

  1. legs
  2. arms
  3. torso
  4. head

Legs - d10

  1. hip
  2. thigh
  3. knee
  4. calf
  5. shin
  6. ankle
  7. achilles
  8. ball
  9. arch
  10. toes

Arms - D8

  1. shoulder
  2. armpit
  3. bicep
  4. elbow
  5. forearm
  6. wrist
  7. hand (roll on hand table)
  8. hand (roll on hand table)

Torso

  1. Heart
  2. Lungs
  3. Stomach
  4. Ribs
  5. Spine
  6. Kidney
  7. Liver
  8. Appendix

Hands - D8

  1. palm
  2. back of hand
  3. thumb
  4. finger - pointer
  5. finger - middle
  6. finger - ring
  7. pinkie
  8. everything
